item.title: Shumail add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Shumail add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Faith is taking the first step even when you can't see the whole staircase." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Shumail add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Shumail add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "How many legs does a dog have if you call the tail a leg? Four. Calling a tail a leg doesn't make it a leg." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Shumail add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Shumail add a quote by A.A. Milne
Shumail add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Never tell the truth to people who are not worthy of it." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Shumail add a quote by Charles J. Sykes
item.description: "Be nice to nerds. You may end up working for them. We all could." -- Charles J. Sykes

item.title: Shumail add a quote by Nicolas Chamfort
item.description: "A day without laughter is a day wasted." -- Nicolas Chamfort

item.title: Shumail add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If we knew what it was we were doing, it would not be called research, would it?" -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Shumail add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Shumail add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Shumail add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Shumail add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Shumail add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Shumail add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "I learned from Hussain how to be wronged and be a winner, I learnt from Hussain how to attain victory while being oppressed." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Shumail add a quote by Ali Ibn Abu Talib
item.description: "He who is greedy is disgraced; he who discloses his hardship will always be humiliated; he who has no control over his tongue will often have to face discomfort." -- Ali Ibn Abu Talib

item.title: Shumail add a quote by Ali Ibn Abu Talib
item.description: "Do not feel ashamed if the amount of charity is small because to refuse the needy is an act of greater shame." -- Ali Ibn Abu Talib

item.title: Shumail add a quote by Hazrat Ali ibn Abu Talib
item.description: "He who has found himself, has found his God...!!!" -- Hazrat Ali ibn Abu Talib

item.title: Shumail add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "I have very carefully studied Islam and the life of its Prophet (PBUH). I have done so both as a student of history and as a critic. And I have come to conclusion that Muhammad (PBUH) was indeed a great man and a deliverer and benefactor of mankind which was till then writhing under the most agonising Pain." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Shumail add a quote by Hadith
item.description: "When you see a person who has been given more than you in money and beauty, then look to those who have been given less." -- Hadith

item.title: Shumail add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "Muhammad (PBUH) is not the father of any man among you, but He is Messenger of Allah and the last of the Prophets. And Allah is Ever AllAware of everything." (Surah Ahzaab Ch33 V40)" -- Anonymous

item.title: Shumail add a quote by Prophet Muhammad
item.description: "ليس الشديد بالصرعة؛ إنما الشديد الذي يملك نفسه عند الغضب The strong person is not the good wrestler. Rather,the strong person is the one who controls himself when he is angry. (<i>Sahih al-Bukhari</i>, Book 73, #135)" -- Prophet Muhammad

item.title: Shumail add a quote by Muhammad
item.description: "The search of knowledge is an obligation laid on every Muslim." -- Muhammad
